q: Credit: Reuters/Robert Galbraith/Files LONDON( Reuters)- Google Inc wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. We certainly want to avoid that, Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview. A Familiar User Experience' In announcing the online version, CEO Steve Ballmer said Dynamics CRM is an industry leader because it gives sales professionals a familiar user experience, enables greater collaboration, and streamlines processes and access to real-time data. The familiarity of the user experience is derived from the use of what Microsoft describes as a "next-generation native Microsoft Outlook client."
